reg:regulation.reg:title:
Speculation and Vacancy Tax
Transitional Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Application of section 67 (1) of the Act

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: In this section, "Act" means the Speculation and Vacancy Tax Act.
For the purpose of applying section 67 (1) of the Act for the 2018 or a subsequent calendar year,

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: paragraph (b) of that section is to be read as if the reference to "on" were a reference to "within 6 years after", and
subparagraphs (b) (i) and (ii) of that section are to be read as if the reference to "the date that is 6 years after" were excluded.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Speculation and Vacancy Tax Act, S.B.C. 2018, c. 46, s. 142.]
